description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Compete with your friends in this multiplayer kart racer! Play 1-4 players splitscreen either locally, over system link or on Xbox Live for a total of 8 players. Use your own Xbox Avatar and race through 3 different seaside courses!
description.short: Compete with your friends in this multiplayer kart racer! Play 1-4 players splitscreen either locally, over system link or on Xbox Live for a total of 8 players. Use your own Xbox Avatar and race through 3 different seaside courses!
